response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations and growth. This product, valued at $1,200,000 to you, represents a unique combination of cutting-edge technology and unparalleled value. We are confident that it will not only meet but exceed your expectations.

Considering its immense worth and the benefits it offers, we are extending a special offer for you to purchase this product at a price of $1,150,000. This offer is exclusive to you and reflects our commitment to fostering long-term partnerships with our esteemed clients.

Should you decide to accept this offer, we assure you of prompt delivery and exceptional customer support throughout the process. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out to us.

We look forward to the possibility of working closely with you and contributing to the success of your endeavors.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1150000}
